uniol.apt.generator.isolated

Class IsolatedTransitionsGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • uniol.apt.generator.isolated.IsolatedTransitionsGenerator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<PetriNet>

    public class IsolatedTransitionsGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable<PetriNet>
    Given some Petri nets, this class provides an Iterable that also adds some isolated transitions to each net.
    Author:
    Uli Schlachter

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      IsolatedTransitionsGenerator(PetriNet pn, int maxTransitions)
      Create a new IsolatedTransitionsGenerator instance.

    • Constructor Detail

      • IsolatedTransitionsGenerator

        public IsolatedTransitionsGenerator(PetriNet pn,
                                    int maxTransitions)
        Create a new IsolatedTransitionsGenerator instance. The resulting iterable will first return the original Petri net and then start adding some isolated elements to it.
        Parameters:
        pn - The Petri net to use.
        maxTransitions - The maximum number of transitions that the resulting Petri nets should have.

    • Method Detail

        public java.util.Iterator<PetriNet> iterator()
